channel.title: Forcing TransPort or SocksPort?
channel.description:
When using the Whonix Workstation, how can I force the Tor browser to use TransPort or SocksPort?
As I understand it, the Tor Browser uses SocksPort by default (in the Whonix Workstation). This is to ensure that different connections to different web servers can't be tied together to a single identity.
I'm just curious if I can disable this, if I feel like it.

item.title: Forcing TransPort or SocksPort?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
To enable transparent torification (no proxy setting), set the TOR_TRANSPROXY=1 environment variable.

Instructions can be found here:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser/Advanced_Users#Remove_Proxy_Settings

Read full topic
